data.eml:eml: Synonymy, new species and new combinations in the leafhopper genus Matsumurina Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Erythroneurini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Yanghui, Yang, Meixia, Zhang, Yalin (2013): Synonymy, new species and new combinations in the leafhopper genus Matsumurina Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Erythroneurini). Zootaxa 3734 (4): 453-468, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.4.3
